subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Hank Bauer was a decorated combat veteran who became an All-Star outfielder for the Yankees, played in nine World Series and later managed the Baltimore Orioles to a stunning Series victory.
snippet: Hank Bauer was a decorated combat veteran who became an All-Star outfielder for the Yankees, played in nine World Series and later managed the Baltimore Orioles to a stunning Series victory.
